short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Battlefield Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Battlefield 5 background. Battlefield V wallpaper background theme for game fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Battlefield Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Battlefield.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Battlefield mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Battlefield HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Battlefield.
short.da: Battlefield Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Battlefield tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Battlefield fans.
short.de: Battlefield Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit benutzerdefinierten Battlefield Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern. Themen…
short.el: Η επέκταση Battlefield Wallpaper αλλάζει νέα σελίδα καρτέλας με προσαρμοσμένο φόντο HD wallpaper Battlefield.
short.es: La extensión del fondo de pantalla de la Battlefield cambia la página de nueva pestaña con el fondo de pantalla HD de la…
short.fi: Battlefield laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Battlefield taustakuvan HD-taustalla. Teemat Battlefield faneille.
short.fr: L'extension Battlefield change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Battlefield. Thèmes pour les fans de Battlefield.
short.it: L'estensione Battlefield cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Battlefield. Temi per i fan di The Battlefield.
short.ja: 戦場の壁紙拡張機能は、カスタムの戦場の壁紙HD背景で新しいタブページを変更します。戦場のためのテーマ。
short.ko: 싸움터 배경 화면 확장은 사용자 정의 싸움터 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 싸움터 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Battlefield zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Battlefield HD. Motywy dla fanów Battlefield.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Battlefield muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Battlefield. Temas para fãs do Battlefield.
short.sv: Battlefield förlängning ändra ny flik med Battlefield tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Battlefield fans.
short.zh_CN: 戰地風雲壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为戰地風雲的背景壁纸。戰地風雲粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 戰地風雲壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為戰地風雲的背景壁紙。戰地風雲粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Battlefield wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Battlefield background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Battlefield new tab.
long.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_B:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Battlefield wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Battlefield background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Battlefield new tab.
